flavorText:
"Unlike Zhalfir, the griffin needs no council to keep harmony among its parts."
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

foreignData.name: Mtendagreif
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
{W}, {T}: Bringe den Mtendagreifen zurück auf die Hand seines Besitzers und bringe eine Greifenkarte Deiner Wahl aus Deinem Friedhof auf Deine Hand. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur während Deiner Versorgungsphase.

foreignData.name: メテンダ・グリフィン

name: Mtenda Griffin
originalText:
Flying
o
W, oc
T: Return Mtenda Griffin to owner's hand and return target Griffin card in your graveyard to your hand. Use this ability only during your upkeep.

rulings.text: Must have a Griffin in the graveyard to use this ability because it requires a target.

text:
Flying
{W}, {T}: Return Mtenda Griffin to its owner's hand and return target Griffin card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.
